description: My full name is Mohammed Murshid KK
I am from Malappuram district, Kerala, India
I am a full-stack developer specializing in frontend development
I have 3 years of experience as a ReactJS developer
I am actively looking for a new Frontend Developer role
ReactJS, Redux Toolkit, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Chakra UI, Ant Design, React Native (Expo), Vitest, React Testing Library, dayjs, and familiar with backend development
Git, GitHub, DataStax Astra, OpenAI, Gemini AI, and Azure

Notable projects include BeeWork (HRMS module for hospitals) and Ajjanamane (home-stay booking app). I also worked on 'dev-connector,' focusing on AI-driven portfolio showcasing, and a physiotherapist organization website
You can find my repositories and contributions on my GitHub profile: [GitHub](https://github.com/mohammedmurshidkk)
You can connect with me on LinkedIn: [LinkedIn](www.linkedin.com/in/murshidkk)

I worked as a Frontend Architect and Lead Developer for BeeWork, an HRMS module for hospitals, and was the sole developer for Ajjanamane, a home-stay booking app. Additionally, I contributed to 'dev-connector' as a part of my portfolio projects.
My long-term career goal is to start a business focused on branding, website development, digital marketing, and social media promotion
I prefer using libraries like dayjs for date handling in projects
Proficient in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and TypeScript. Familiar with backend technologies but prefer frontend development
I am a confident and quick learner, able to adapt to new technologies swiftly. I ensure a positive impact on the team by contributing effectively to projects from the start
By hiring me, you'll gain a team player who ensures code quality, adheres to best practices, and is passionate about delivering user-friendly and scalable applications
I am ambitious, a planner, and dedicated to achieving innovative solutions. Being single allows me to relocate and dedicate extra time to challenging projects if needed
